short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that blocks webpages based on your current task

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Concenter is a smart website blocker in which you enter the topic of your task using relevant keywords and related words. The extension will then block any webpages that are not relevant to your current task other than general productivity websites such as office.com. Your productivity will greatly increase with this product as it will stop you from surfing the web when you have an important task to do.
